title: cmd/godoc: text output displays command internals.
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

$ go doc cmd/go

What is the expected output?

The package comment.

What do you see instead?

The package comment and types.

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version devel +127f96912009 Wed Feb 20 15:57:18 2013 -0800 linux/amd64
